noAssessment.title: No Assessment Data
noAssessment.description: Complete the assessment first to unlock AI-powered analysis of your identity patterns.

dirty.title: Assessment Incomplete
dirty.message: You have pending changes in your assessment. Complete the assessment to save and enable new analysis.

ready.title: Ready to Analyze
ready.description: Click below to send your assessment data to Claude for deep pattern analysis. This typically takes around 15 minutes.

loading.title: Analyzing...
loading.description: Claude is finding patterns in your responses

synthesisTab.nextStepHelp: This is the smallest believable shift from where you are now.

reanalyze.description: Each analysis can surface different insights based on Claude's interpretation

saveError.title: Analysis Not Saved
saveError.message: Your analysis is displayed but couldn't be saved to your account.
